metadata.Title: CVE-2019-0187 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: Unauthenticated RCE is possible when JMeter is used in distributed mode (-ror -R command line options). Attacker can establish a RMI connection to ajmeter-server using RemoteJMeterEngine and proceed with an attack usinguntrusted data deserialization. This only affect tests running inDistributed mode. Note that versions before 4.0 are not able to encrypttraffic between the nodes, nor authenticate the participating nodes soupgrade to JMeter 5.1 is also advised.

criterions.comment: jakarta-jmeter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
